Ametros.com

Website
  • HTML
  • Sass
  • Javascript
  • PHP
  • Wordpress
  • Sketch
  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator

Public Foods is an online cookbook that hosts recipes from my friends and family. I'm not alone with my love for cooking, so I decided to create a site that allows people to share their favorite recipes.

Special attention was paid towards ease of use and simplicity for the users. The site allows users to create a profile, and upload recipes all from the frontend of the site.

Design Concept

Public Foods was designed to be as simple and easy to use as possible. Many of the cooking websites around the web are cluttered and feel claustrophobic. I wanted Public Foods to have a very minimal design with a lot of whitespace.

I used Sketch to map out each of the three main sections of the site, including the indexes, the recipe upload form, and the recipe layout.

Public Foods

Community Cookbook
  • HTML
  • Sass
  • Javascript
  • PHP
  • Wordpress
  • Sketch
  • Photoshop
  • Illustrator

Public Foods is an online cookbook that hosts recipes from my friends and family. I'm not alone with my love for cooking, so I decided to create a site that allows people to share their favorite recipes.

The site allows users to create a profile, and share their own recipes

Design Concept

Many of the cooking sites around the web are cluttered and have too much filler content. I wanted Public Foods to have a minimal design that focuses on the recipes.

About

Hi, my name is Travis Miller. I'm a web and UI designer living in Boston. I graduated from Wentworth Institute of Technology in 2010 with a degree in Industrial Design. After graduation, I worked as a furniture designer and woodworker with Bill Bancroft Furniture Design. From there I moved into a role as a design engineer at Design Communications Ltd. I now focus my time on web and user interface design.

When Iâ€™m not drawing rectangles or writing code, I spend my time making music or helping people build stuff.

Have a cool project you're working on? I'd love to hear about it.
